text: LMK if you want to pitch this to HubSpot <@U7SL518D6> I can help facilitate. :slightly_smiling_face:

still prefer to get some thoughts together and make further progress before pitching it. Something I wrote for the documentation site elaborates on how HubSpot can uniquely sponsor in more effective ways than others could.
